english.segment1: "Let us worship". Let us sing - Chorus. Halleujah to the king. Let us raise our voices high. Praise the name of Jesus Christ
english.segment2: Oh- Oh "Chorus". Oooooh Oooooh. Oh Oh "Chorus"
english.segment4: Let us worship "Chorus". Let us sing. Halleujah to the king. Let us raise our voices high. Praise the name of Jesus Christ
english.segment5: "Let us Worship". Let us worship "Chorus". Let us sing. Halleujah to the king. In him we live, move and have our being. He is lord of everything
english.segment6: Everybody say Oh. Oh - Oh. thats your part right there say Oooooh. Oh - Oh
english.segment7: "Come and let us worship". Lift your voice (2x). To the king of kings and the lord of lords. Every nation on one accord. Praise his name forevermore
english.segment9: Lets Give God the highest praise
english.segment10: Halleu- ujah, Halleu-ujah, Halleujah (Repeat 12X). We praise your name. "Ooooohh". We praise your name (twice at the end)
